overview: Partner with PlanAccelerator executive-level consultants, Jessica blends business strategy with technology expertise to design solutions and products. From designing the first health insurance CRM for Medicare national call centers to designing the first real-time communications tool for suppliers and distributors on top of RosettaNet, OrderTrax2, her designs drive fundamental changes in businesses and industries. Previously CEO of iServcorp, COO - CIO of Implicit Monitoring Solutions, and CEO of Riddle Technologies.
